textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: And the fishes go round, and round, and...

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Where did all these mean-looking sharks come from? You\n must be getting close to the King Shark's lair! Keep going!\n You're almost there!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Sharks like to dart in quickly for the
 kill. Try hiding behind mines for protection.
